[Advanced]

Effect You are the rightful master of the infernal keep known as Diggen's Rest. Once per adventure, you can use the following reaction.

Infernal Detonations

Action Reaction

Trigger A creature within 30 feet of you targets you or an ally with an attack.

Effect The creature takes fire damage equal to [[/r 1d6 + @actor.level]]{1d6 + your level} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.data.data.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|basic:true]). The DC of the Reflex save is equal to your spell DC or your class DC, whichever is higher.
